results.title: Effects of ACE inhibition and beta-blockade on collagen remodelling in the heart of Bio 14.6 hamsters.
results.text_hl: Male @SPECIES_10026 @@@hamsters@@@ (76-79 days old) were given low-dose @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ (3 mg/kg per day), high-dose @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ (30 mg/kg per day), @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (50 mg/kg per day) or vehicle for 65 days.

citations.NLM: Mansoor AM, Honda M, Kuramochi T, Tanaka K, Morioka S, Takabatake T. Effects of ACE inhibition and beta-blockade on collagen remodelling in the heart of Bio 14.6 hamsters. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol. 1996 Jan;23(1):43-9. PMID: 8713495
